title: The Bridge
marks: Signature, date, title and edition below image, in pencil: [29/50 \"THE BRIDGE\" John E
description: photographic image of six bridges spanning a waterway between tall city buildings, printed in blue; orange and purple vertical smeared lines at R and L edges and top; purple blocks and splotches at top and central area
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
